thread.title: Couple’s imagination turns private mansion into bucolic inn
thread.title_full: Couple’s imagination turns private mansion into bucolic inn - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Carolyn Jung
title: Couple’s imagination turns private mansion into bucolic inn
text:
Photo: Inn At Park Winters The Cottage at the Inn at Park Winters. The Cottage at the Inn at Park Winters.
San Francisco real estate developer Rafael Galiano still remembers the day clearly. He was lying in bed with a sprained ankle, surfing the Internet, when he happened upon what could only be described as “the most gnarly flyer ever” for a piece of property. The Cottage at the Inn at Park Winters. The Cottage at the Inn at Park Winters.
